repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This text is related to Pañcarātra āgama. Front cover is damaged hence two palm leaves are tied with red thread. First folio is broken at the centre. Some matter in Granth script but not completely legible.

msItem.title: Āgamaprāmāṇyaṃ
msItem.explicit: 124v 3 ….. ākalpaṃ vilasantu sātvatamatapraspardhiduṣpaddhativyāmugdhoddhatadurvidagdhapariṣadvaidagdhyaviddhvaṃ 124v 4 sinaḥ śrīmannāthamunīndravardhītadhīyo nirdhūtaviśvāśivāḥ sanntassantatagadyapadyapadavīhṛdyānavadyoktayaḥ .. hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu 124v 5 śrīmadvedāntarāmānujasaṃyamīndramahādeśikavaraṇakamalarakṣakābhyāṃ namaḥ ….. śrīmate nṛsīmhāyamahāgurave namaḥ .. śrīmate lakṣmīnandanatātadeśikaṃ mahā 124v 6 gurave namaḥ

support.p: Front cover is damaged hence two palm leaves are tied with red thread.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in left margin on the verso of the folio

additions.desc: āgamaprāmāṇyaṃ hariḥ oṃ is written on 100v in the left margin.

listBibl.bibl: Agama Prāmāṇya Of Yamuna Acharya Edited By Dr M Narasimhachary Gaekwad’s Oriental Series number 160: Maharaj Sayajirav University Baroda: 1976

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text: 100v 1 yatpadābhorubadhyānavidhvastāśeṣakalmaṣaḥ 124v 3 ….. ākalpaṃ vilasantu sātvatamatapraspardhiduṣpaddhativyāmugdhoddhatadurvidagdhapariṣadvaidagdhyaviddhvaṃ 124v 4 sinaḥ śrīmannāthamunīndravardhītadhīyo nirdhūtaviśvāśivāḥ sanntassantatagadyapadyapadavīhṛdyānavadyoktayaḥ .. hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu 124v 5 śrīmadvedāntarāmānujasaṃyamīndramahādeśikavaraṇakamalarakṣakābhyāṃ namaḥ ….. śrīmate nṛsīmhāyamahāgurave namaḥ .. śrīmate lakṣmīnandanatātadeśikaṃ mahā 124v 6 gurave namaḥ
